name: Canadian Tire cleaner
description:
Removes several annoyances from CanadianTire.ca including wasted space and poorly placed navigation aids.
More could be done, but this got it to what I consider 'usable'.
additional_info:
ver.2017-10-08
* removed site navigation flyout bar
* removed credit advert
* removed poorly placed site usage links
* removed 'related products' between photo+price and description (details, feature list)
* removed wasted space
